meanings.definition: The tendency to derive pleasure from inflicting pain or suffering on others.
meanings.sent1: His sadisms were evident in the way he enjoyed watching horror movies.
meanings.sent2: The villain's sadisms were portrayed vividly in the movie, causing fear among the audience.
meanings.sent3: Although it may seem strange, some people find humor in sadisms when watching scary pranks.
meanings.sent4: The sadisms of the antagonist in the story were like a dark cloud looming over the protagonist.
meanings.sent5: The sadisms of the bully made him feared by all the students in the school.
